website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy, especially when compared to thin incandescents. These cool bulbs are great for homeowners with enclosed light fixtures.
pros: Can be used in enclosed fixtures without overheating
"Daylight" color spectrum is brighter than yellow incandescent bulbs
cons: Although described as "soft white," some owners argue it's more of a yellow hue

customer_reviews.title: Fastest 18 years I ever did see
customer_reviews.text: First these are beyond a shadow of a doubt by all accounts with complete certainty, a 6 pack of light bulbs. I attest to that. The part that isn't quite adding up for me is the 18 year lifespan. I have to buy a new pack every 4 months or so. Let's see I bought one today. I bought a pack in May. I bought a pack in Feb. I bought a pack in Sep before that. These burn out pretty much the same as any incandescent, maybe faster. Either that or I'm careening through spacetime at relativistic speeds and these light bulbs are aging normally. That makes a lot sense, glad you agree.
customer_reviews.author: kitano

customer_reviews.title: Your box will probably come with several duds.
customer_reviews.text: These seem like a good deal, and I purchased several boxes of them in September and December 2016. Several of the bulbs in each of the boxes were duds. Some of them blew out, some had burned spots on the glass, some cracked at the base. I suspect this is just a quality control issue. I wonder how long the rest will last compared to the advertised "18.3 years".
customer_reviews.author: P.M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, cost efficient!
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give this 4 stars since a bulb or two was buzzing when I installed them, until I checked again and tried a few bulbs, they all buzzed! The problem was the SOCKET, NOT THE BULB! The same bulb that "buzzed" in the bad socket worked fine in the fine socket! Never had a issue with these, they are a great product at a great price! P.S the review is for the 6 pack, non energy star ones. Daylight and soft light versions. The daylight is great for offices, bathroom vanities and kitchens where you want that brighter whiter light. The soft light ones are better for dining rooms etc.
customer_reviews.author: Slim

customer_reviews.title: This is a great price for a six pack of 60watt A19 LEDs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great price for a six pack of 60watt A19 LEDs. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because out of the 3 six packs we've ordered 2 of the 18 bulbs had a buzzing noise when plugged in. Of course, Amazon's phenomenal customer service fixed the issue, but still it was a slight annoyance. I would definitely buy more if needed, but that shouldn't be for years.
customer_reviews.author: NineNines

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: this light bulbs all have worked so far. The only compliant is that some think that it is too bright. It think its fine and it some people like the warm light like old light bulbs. I would make sure you know the one like first. I didn't get much of a power saving because might old lights use 10 watts and these used 9 watts. I put them on the socket that we used the most. I put them also in the basement to help better light area's that our regular light bulbs didn't get to. also to replace the last of the old light bulbs that we had.
customer_reviews.author: paul 29

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bulbs. Led technology has come a long way ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bulbs. Led technology has come a long way in terms of price and quality. I have converted my whole house to led and my electric bill has gone down at least 75 dollars a month. Everyone should be converting their entire house to led bulbs. These are far superior to CFL. I some areas I have had led bulbs for three years and have yet to replace one. Also great for bulbs that are high up so you dont have to go through the hassle of changing them.
customer_reviews.author: AmaniSofia

customer_reviews.title: Vampires beware!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the 5-bulb chandelier in my dining room. They aren't kidding when they say these lights have a "daylight" quality! It's great for me, because I often use my sewing machine at my dining room table and the bright light is very helpful. Despite being bright enough to kill vampires, it's not the kind of light that hurts human eyes. Still, these bulbs might not be the best choice for most people's preferences in a multi-bulb fixture over the dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if I just got a bad bath or what but I won't be ordering any ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this 6 pack back in June and now as of January 4 have already stopped working. 3 quit working completely and 1 is very dim. Used them in two different fixtures. Not sure if I just got a bad bath or what but I won't be ordering any other TCP bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Wow, these are great.
customer_reviews.text: I will update is something goes wrong, however there is such a difference in these from the ones the apartment had before! I hate yellow lighting and these are true daylight light bulbs. None were broken in shipping. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Holland

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely not for enclosed fixtures.
customer_reviews.text: Despite being assured that these are approved for totally enclosed light fixtures, 6 months later, every single bulb I purchased is dead. They're probably fine in open fixtures and lamps, but you absolutely do not want to buy these if your application is totally enclosed. These will burn out within 8-10 weeks. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Bright, cool to touch and true daylight appearance.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long the light itself will last, but the Daylight bulbs are as bright and clean looking as advertised. Bulbs are packaged well in a sturdy reusable box, that can be used for storage. No extra little individual boxes, which I am grateful for. I was surprised by the weight of each bulb. They are heavier than CFLs or standard incandescents and appear to be quite well made. Extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: The Princess and the Pea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color, bright, rated for fully enclosed fixtures... GREAT bulbs!
customer_reviews.text: These are slightly "whiter" than I expected, but I'm glad! They're just "yellow" enough to not look out of place like some daylight bulbs. No, sorry, I do not have equipment to measure color temp and lumens. All I can say is I'm very pleased with the color temperature and light output from these. They almost make my kitchen too bright... almost. I think they're just right, nice and bright. Plus, these are the only brand I found that are rated for fully enclosed light fixtures. I fully intend to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Irwin Electronics

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs. Way more power efficient than filament bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Great bulbs. Way more power efficient than filament bulbs, but not much more than cfls. I've had other LED bulbs that were more efficient and gave off less heat at the base. I measure under 10 watts on these. The light they give off is perfect. They are instantaneously at peak brightness and they have the perfect 2700k glow. The cfls these replaced took about 20 minutes to fully warm up and the color would vary in the process. These were cheap enough to replace all the bulbs in our house with. I had no DOA bulbs out of the 60 or so that installed.
customer_reviews.author: Katano

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright, cool light
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 4 of these 6-packs. Every one of the bulbs worked perfectly. I like how cool they are to the touch. We are not FL and it really helps keep the rooms cooler, such as in small rooms like bathrooms and closets. My wife likes the blue "daylight" color. I like the old yellow "soft white" incandescent color but I am starting to get used to the blue light. It is harsher, but much brighter. My wife is convinced it will help our daughter in MN where the winters can be long and dark.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Medics

customer_reviews.title: I can see now!
customer_reviews.text: I have several areas in my apartment that don't have windows (closet, laundry room, bathroom) and they seemed very dark with the normal incandescent bulbs. These daylighters have changed my life - I can actually see what I'm doing! I put one in my reading lamp too, since I often read paper books. I prefer the "color" of this light, which makes the print much clearer when used in a lamp above and slightly behind where I'm sitting. It would be unpleasant if the light was directed toward your face or was placed somewhere in your field of vision, as these bulbs are VERY bright.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Billington

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: TCP 60w led bulb not working, only 5 of six pack work. EDIT 11/20: Your warranty request has been submitted for review. A representative from TCP will contact you, if necessary. Please be advised that a warranty claim for multiple units or occurrences may require additional information to process the request. TCP reserves the right to request the product to be returned for inspection prior processing the claim. Do not discard the lamp(s) until you receive notice from TCP. Upon approval of the claim, at TCP’s discretion an equivalent product replacement or gift card will be sent to the shipping address submitted on the request form. Please allow 30 days for processing.
customer_reviews.author: lcb

customer_reviews.title: It works, but not well
customer_reviews.text: I have a wall lamp with a wall dimmer in my room. My GE LED Dimmable bulb broke so I bought these to replace that. While the bulb works and the brightness is there, I ran into some issues. -The bulb does not turn off completely, even with the wall switch off. It remained on but very dim. Clearly noticeable in a dark room. -The bulb emits a loud buzzing noise when in brightest dimmer mode. Would not recommend these bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great lights for the price! Good product works as promised with warm color!
customer_reviews.text: Bright and work well in standard sockets. The durability has yet to be determined but since purchse and install we have not had an issue. The brightness is perfect given the lumen selection adn the light is warm without the traditional LED glow that may hurt some eyes. As we have replaced our entire home with LED we have seen a small but noticeable decrease in teh electricity bill. High recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are good, but they are much brighter than the regular 60W bulbs I replaced. I bought them for a 6 light bathroom fixture and the light output is hard on the eyes when turning them on in the morning. I tried TCP's 40W equivalent, but those bulbs made a loud buzzing noise and are being returned. I'll keep looking for a "less-bright" replacement, but will keep these for use in lamps or other fixtures as I've used TCP bulbs for a few years now and find them to be a good quality for the money.
customer_reviews.author: ImjustAZKen

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and well packaged. Once installed the bulbs light to full brightness, however, they have a annoying flicker that is only getting more pronounced the longer I use the bulbs. The flickering isn’t consistent either, sometimes nothing and others I have to turn the light off due to the severity. I have tried them in different lamps and ceiling sockets with the same results so I know it’s the bulbs and not a electrical issue with the house.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sulham

customer_reviews.title: second time I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was time to go LED as prices have fallen and over the life of the bulb I should save a lot, and as they have been around for a while, I figured the bugs would be out of the mfg process. When CFL came out their quality was spotty. These work 100% of the time and come very well packaged. All my bulbs have been changed except 2 remaining CFLs and it seems there is a noticeable change in my electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: HAJ

customer_reviews.title: Give Joy to the Light Bulb!
customer_reviews.text: If somebody Is reading this let me start by saying If you purchase these light bulb It's bright. If you have a dimly lighted room this right here Is going to solve that problem and brighten up that room. Changing from a dull yellow light bulb to this one made a very big difference In the brightness of the room I put this In. Everything was much more clearer to see in the room, It's bright enough that it doesn't hurt your eyes, and overall I felt this was a fantastic purchase. Any room In the house I'm living In Is definitely going to have one of these lightbulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Silva

customer_reviews.title: Same brightness and color as soft white CFL for slightly less power usage!
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised to receive next day on a Prime order instead of 2 days. (Bonus!) Then was also surprised it wasn't a box inside of a bigger box!!! (Another Bonus!!) And lastly, took one bulb out and replaced a CFL bulb and wow... awesome... same brightness and color!!! (Another Bonus!!!) Next up... see how long it lasts... this particular light location is on 24/7!!! :) Already got to see longevity of a CFL light... now I will find out for LED... And the power usage is less too... Bonus ALL AROUND!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Daylight, sunlight, great light Oh my
customer_reviews.text: The daylight bulbs are so bright and such a clean color! I love it! Make sure you have an appropriate fixture/lampshade though or it'll just cause vision spots and you'll probably think it's too much. I wish I had found these sooner, they're a steal compared to store bought 👌 I've never been this excited about light bulb. And they only get warm not scalding hot! An old light bulb this awesome would burn my hand and I just grabbed the one in the lamp next to me. Perfect hand warming temperature if you live in the cold lol
customer_reviews.author: Snowyjake

customer_reviews.title: Extreme blue light and defective
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs cast a sickly blue color that is unlike any other daylight LED bulbs I have seen with the exact same specs. Three of the six bulbs flicker after they are on for about 20 minutes so half of them are defective. Would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MurphysLaw

customer_reviews.title: Mine Didn't Work
customer_reviews.text: Bulbs arrived well packaged and with no apparent physical damage, but not one of them worked properly. It appears to be an internal problem - screwing them in, they light briefly at about 3/4 of the way, then go out and stay out when screwed in all the way. Other bulbs work fine in the same fixture.
customer_reviews.author: Napa Jack

customer_reviews.title: VERY HAPPY! I had purchased similar LED light bulbs from ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY HAPPY! I had purchased similar LED light bulbs from Lowe's during the Black Friday special it was their lowest quality bulbs they had they were a dollar apiece. In my bathroom they would flutter very slightly it bothered me I thought I had an electrical problem "using 2 of them and I had replaced the light fixtures" I bought these bulbs and replaced them and haven't had a problem! And these bulbs actually seem brighter and the construction looks superior. I also replaced some spot LED lights in my china cabinet and these burn considerably brighter and actually seem cooler than the smaller spot LEDs I purchased from China for $4.99 each. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: P. McCleary

customer_reviews.title: Bright Light!  Bright Light!! Pay attention to your choice......
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have opted for the "soft white" option rather than "daylight" because these daylight bulbs are pretty harsh!! I installed the 6 pack in my ceiling lights in the 3 bedrooms in my house. Fortunately, I also have lamps in the rooms (otherwise I'd have needed to swap the "daylight" bulbs out right away). They probably have a place, but I am not feeling the lighting scheme at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Did not last, and difficult to remove
customer_reviews.text: We bought a box of 6 bulbs in March 2018. One burst and four others have already burned out. (The final one was only installed about a month ago, so its longevity has not yet been tested.) Additionally, three of the four that burned out were difficult to remove because the bulb separated from the screw-in base when we attempted to unscrew it. We will not buy this brand again, nor do we recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: E Herch

customer_reviews.title: Great package, good light, happy customer
customer_reviews.text: NOTICE: After a year of use with FULLY ENCLOSED globe fixtures (6 of them), I have yet to have a failure. Two other brands of 9W LED's I've used died in a matter of months in similar enclosures. These are switched by a motion detector, so they turn on and off pretty often and get quite a bit of ON time in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Condor

customer_reviews.title: These bulbs flicker horribly!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these a couple years ago and they worked great so when the old bulbs started dying out I placed a reorder. The new bulbs don’t seem to have the same quality as the old ones. The new ones are noticeably lighter in weight, they aren’t quite as bright as the old ones, and the worst part is the new ones flicker constantly! I’m now just past the return window so I guess I will just have to get rid of them and buy a different brand. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C Workman

customer_reviews.title: looked like a good deal
customer_reviews.text: looked like a good deal....BUT, TRULY CRAP !!! these LED bulbs are supposed to last for many years...so far these have burned out in months. I think I have one left still working out of the 6. don't waste your money! Just go to Walmart and pick them up for less. Not worth my time to send back...since they failed at different times.
customer_reviews.author: stephen e holm

customer_reviews.title: Failure starts after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: So far 3 of the 18 bulbs we have purchased have stopped working. All failed in different rooms but in the same way, an intermittent crackling sound with some blinking before it stopped working altogether. The diodes are supposed to last over a decade, so these were disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Burn out quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I've already had to replace two of these bulbs in the last few months. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. D. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Flickers
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure I understand why these bulbs receive good reviews. I have these bulbs in a ceiling fan, and am constantly changing them out. Flickering is a major issue. As I am writing this now, two of the three in the fan are flickering. Of the 6 bulbs, one was DOA, and all but one have had an issue with flickering, usually within the first 50 hours of use
customer_reviews.author: Numbers

customer_reviews.title: New LA927KND6 flickers...
customer_reviews.text: If you wanted to know why these don't say non-flicker, it's because they flicker at double main frequency. This is extra aggravating since the previous set of TCP LA927KND6 I bought from the same Amazon listing has a different base and does not flicker at all. The new ones are 1/2" shorter and lighter, which would be good if they didn't flicker.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Every single one has failed within a year
customer_reviews.text: Every single one of these bulbs failed within the first year either by no longer providing any light, or with intermittent strobe-like behavior. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R. Butler

customer_reviews.title: I like the light's hue and will probably buy more when ...
customer_reviews.text: From the Q&A I got the impression the bulbs could be used in an enclosed space. So use at your own risk. The box says the bulbs can be used in "damp" locations. In big-box stores, LED bulbs that can be used in damp locations cannot be used in closed fixtures. A reviewer said the bulb was not hot to the touch. That reviewer must have asbestos fingers - it gets untouchably hot near the base.. However, I like the light's hue and will probably buy more when my other bulbs burn out.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Good Value On LED Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to convert the last few lamps in the house to LED bulbs. They are lower usage vs. the others I already changed over. They have good brightness and color. So far they have all lasted a few months at least and all worked out of the box (unlike other comments here). Am happy with these & would rebuy when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Didnt even last me a year
customer_reviews.text: the bulb started flickering and was very dim after about 8 months of use
customer_reviews.author: MARTY

customer_reviews.title: I must be bad at math
customer_reviews.text: Based on other recent reviews, I am not the only one discovering that these bulbs fall well short of the stated, "18 YEAR LIFESPAN – Rated at 20, 000 hours based on 3 hours per day." According to my math (and you can check me on this), I am 17 years short of the advertised life of the bulb. Let's see, 18 year life, I have had mine 1 year...yup, 17 years short should be right. I understand a product falling a bit short of the rated lifetime, but this seems a bit extreme. You may want to look elsewhere for a LED lighting solution.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The difference is quite remarkable and makes a believer of just how nice LED bulbs are
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase of a 6-pack of these bulbs. The first purchase was so pleasing that a second purchase was made. This purchase replaced some compact fluorescent and incandescent bulbs in a kitchen lamp over a table and in the garage. The difference is quite remarkable and makes a believer of just how nice LED bulbs are. The daylight 5000K bulbs are certainly bright and such a welcome change to see a crisp, clean light. It is so nice to turn on a light in the darkness of early morning or at night and see the room come to life with so much light.
customer_reviews.author: Roger L.

customer_reviews.title: Hoping THESE will last.
customer_reviews.text: My last bunch from another company didn't last. Got maybe 2.5 years until all 6 were done. So far so good and satisfied. They are plenty bright and working flawlessly. Best part is they run so cool. Major plus in a bathroom. I will update as time marches on.
customer_reviews.author: Old Tech

customer_reviews.title: All blown within a year.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are supposed to last 4.5 years at 3.5 hours a day average use. These were in the kids bathroom and they have all blown within a year and I have had replace them all. I would not recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jonboyc

customer_reviews.title: Saves money on electricity
customer_reviews.text: What is not to love about Led lights? They save tons and tons of money on the power bill. I normally opt for the 100 watt but in the living room where we watch tv we use these in our lamps so that it is not brighter than the television! They are a good deal especially if you have regular incandescent bulbs then replace them with these.... depending on the amount of time your lights are left on you could really notice a sigificant difference in your power bill.
customer_reviews.author: miss independent

customer_reviews.title: So bright my paint turned white
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these bulbs as I intend to change my whole home to LED lighting. They arrived packed neatly and for later storage. Once I plugged the lights into the sockets and flipped the switch, whoa! Very bright white light. I really am impressed with the output of these bulbs. My only recommendation would be to not place these in an area where you would expect somewhat softer lighting. My kitchen has more of a natural yellow tone and these lights would make the whole vibe feel wrong. They work excellent in the bathrooms, porch and garage areas.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light!
customer_reviews.text: On the second or third, or was it the eighth day? Never mind. There needed to be light. Cost effective long lasting light in a nice natural spectrum to illuminate the dark cavities of the house if not my heart. These worked. However, I still do not understand what the Transmission Control Protocol has to do with a simple electric light bulb brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: TCP 60 WATT LED LIGHT BULBS
customer_reviews.text: These came very fast. Well packaged. This is my second order of Led bulbs. I have finally got all the lights changed to the LED bulbs in my house. It is brighter and my electric bill is lower. I showed my light fixtures how close they are and these bulbs fit fine two bulbs in each and really all I needed was one. This is a great deal. I hope this has helped. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: They do not last long at all...avoid
customer_reviews.text: Update: Avoid these cheap Chinese bulbs. These bulbs do not last long. I've had 3 go out in rooms where the light is rarely on in less than a year. One was dim out of the box. I have 2 bulbs out of 6 remaining that I'm sure will be out soon also. Original review: 5 of the 6 bulbs were great. One, however was not as bright as the others. Swapped bulbs within the same fixture to make sure it wasnt the fixture. Not bad for the price, and they do look great. Not sure how consistent the quality is overall.
customer_reviews.author: Drew K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bulbs where you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are cheap, and that's why I bought them. Buyer beware. These do not last long. I have had two die out so far. The first bulb went out after about a month and a half. The second just died, 9 months in. I have bought other LED bulbs around the same time, and they are still outputting light. I will not be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: 111tribe

customer_reviews.title: Very good for work places.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs simulate 'Daylight' which is good in a work environment, but they may not produce enough light to do the job. If not, a 100 Watt equivalent bulb would be a better choice, even at a higher price. I speak from experience. To create a relaxing atmosphere you a warmer light source, fewer Kelvin degrees. Otherwise, these bulbs are great. I have a ceiling fixture in a work room that holds two bulbs. Now I can really see things well; much better than with the old outdated CFL bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Dodger

customer_reviews.title: Big fan of the value, and they do last
customer_reviews.text: I have been switching my house over to these light bulbs exclusively in the last couple years as my traditional bulbs burn out. So far, have not had to replace ANY of these new bulbs, and it has been a couple years of regular use. Could not be happier with the power reduction as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lifespan is ridiculously short
customer_reviews.text: Not only did they not last anywhere near the claimed 20,000 hours but they failed in a very annoying way. At roughly 500 hours of usage they started flickering before coming on. Over the next 200 hours or so of usage the flickering got worse and they began to dim until they finally quit coming on at all. Incandescents and fluorescents in the same application have lasted as long if not longer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Roach

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, short life.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs seemed to be of low quality when I first handled them, but I thought maybe it doesn’t take a lot to make a good LED bulb. I installed them on Nov 3 and the first one burned out today, Jan 7.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey W. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be good bulb
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Had hit or miss luck with LEDs so far. Some name brands, some national store brands and some no names. Been averaging failure rates of at least 50% with the A19 series bulbs. These have been with me for only a short time but dated them with Sharpie on install and will be monitoring them closely for early failure.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Allen

customer_reviews.title: Decent bulbs, bad life
customer_reviews.text: While you certainly can't beat the price on these bulbs, I've had three burn out within 5 months with only moderate use. I'd expect that with regular incandescents, but with LEDs the expectation is certainly for longer life. The light that the bulb produces is warm and bright, which is why I'm giving this 2 stars instead of 1, but I wouldn't recommend these bulbs for anyone looking for a long-lasting LED.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Long life, low wattage, environmentally friendly!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for LEDs. They are being used in a 7 light bathroom fixture that has wattage restrictions. Similar in size to old incandescent bulbs, hopefully we'll get more hours from these than the compact fluorescents they are replacing. These don't have to go in hazardous waste drop off like the CFL's, big selling feature!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Plan on going with all LED lights throughout the house. Just received these and am ordering more. The fact is they are brighter than the cfl bulbs they replaced and a closer resemblance to the actual coloration of soft white incandescence bulbs. I specifically ordered these because unlike the vast majority of LED bulbs out there they are compatible with enclosed fixtures for which I have many,
customer_reviews.author: Techman

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: The old TCP bulbs were awesome, but now they use a standard 'shell' that most of the Chinese manufacturers seem to be switching to. Please update the product photos!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great, Bright Bulbs! Work Great in Totally Enclosed Fixtures!
customer_reviews.text: So far these have worked great in our totally enclosed dome fixtures (two bulbs per dome), no flickering at all. Dome itself seems to stay cool, even after extended use. Color looks great, we love them over our old "warm light" incandescents. If any of this changes (I've had them installed for a least a few weeks now) I'll try to remember to update this review, but otherwise, yeah, great bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy and Kia

customer_reviews.title: more white light because it is pretty dark in there
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use in my laundry room. I wanted a bright, more white light because it is pretty dark in there. These fit the bill perfectly. I used 2 and they light up the room well. The laundry room is about 6' x 12'. I also like the fact that they are led so I should not have to replace them that often and they will be energy efficient. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Already have had two go out on us in the mere few months we have had them. Do not waste your money, time, or effort to switch to these.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a little longer than a incandescent bulb
customer_reviews.text: One of the things I heard about LED bulbs was the long life. I dislike having to replace the bulbs in my light fixtures. Although these use less energy and are pretty bright, it's been about a year and 2 of the 6 have already stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Krugerio

customer_reviews.title: Slightly sad that they didn't come in the awesome TCP case
customer_reviews.text: Slightly sad that they didn't come in the awesome TCP case, but it's understandable given that my first pack was $36 - the price is now much more affordable. The bulbs themselves remain bright and quality-made! Been buying these for years; not a single one has burnt out yet. So I started replacing bulbs at my family's houses! I'm sure they find it silly - but I'm told they love the brightness and color index.
customer_reviews.author: Zatronium

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: While I have only had these light bulbs in my bathroom vanity light for 2 weeks now, they work as they were intended to. Only thing that I could complain about is the yellowish tint that they display. I recently had 4 different brand soft white LED light bulbs in place of these ones that didn't have such a yellowish tint. Regardless, the light bulbs work well and the tint wasn't noticeable by anyone else in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very bright!
customer_reviews.text: These are crazy bright!! It did exactly what we wanted for our space but if you were to use these in a smaller space they would be too much. We have a vaulted ceiling and needed track lighting so these brightened the area fine. But very doctors office kind of bright.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Goteef

customer_reviews.title: Very bright, Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I use these in a glass enclosure inside a hood system above a 600 degree char grill in a commercial restaurant kitchen. Light bulbs do not survive the grease and heat for more than a week or two usually. These tend to outlast many other options and I will continue to use them. The daylight bulb is a very bright bulb which is perfect for my kitchen use in a commercial environment.
customer_reviews.author: Mach Rounds

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I got the daylight color and am very please with them. Even though the box says they are 100 lumens less bright than the CFLs they replaced, they seem much brighter. In fact, I would dare say they are. I think the CFL mfg. lie. I know they lie about the life of their product, so why not lie about the output?
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R.

customer_reviews.title: So much for LED being the light bulb of the future
customer_reviews.text: In less than a year of use I have had two of these bulbs burn out -- the only two I've used so far. Can I go back to incandescent, please?
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad price.
customer_reviews.text: One day my front porch light was flickering and my son-in-law suggested I buy LED bulbs. I had never thought of that. These bulbs work great. Bright and (I hope) long lasting. These are definitely less expensive than the big retail chains or home improvement stores.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Griffith-Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Works great, very bright, matches the bulbs I bought over 2 years ago
customer_reviews.text: A couple years ago I bought these exact same bulbs (but the previous version). I was a little hesitant to order these because I was worried they would not perfectly match the previous batch I ordered. Thankfully they do match and they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Chad Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: High failure rate
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in December and installed them immediately in my six light bathroom light fixture. The color temperature was as advertised. Unfortunately, I've had a high failure rate. After six months of use, three of the six bulbs have failed completely.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: A natural "Daylight" like bulb. Seems like the most natural light I can get indoors from a bulb.
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs were bright, and very much a "daylight" color. No yellow orange coloring just a white, I do painting and need natural daylight to get my coloring just right, cloudy or rainy days I don't get sufficient brightness throughout the house so these bulbs are a must for me. Although not a complete replacement for natural light I can get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Vallerii

customer_reviews.title: Better, brighter, cheaper for equivalent bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: What a remarkable way to light the house and at a BARGAIN PRICE! I will reorder this again so that every lamp and fixture uses their bubs. I am happier than I thought I'd be. I just bought similar bulbs at Home Depot but these are BETTER, BRIGHTER and CHEAPER even though it supposedly had the same everything but more expensive for much fewer bulbs!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: The only bulbs I use!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these bulbs to change all the lighting in my home. They are asthetically-pleasing as well as very functional in my bathroom vanity and makeup vanity mirrors (where the bulbs are exposed). They give a clean, bright light. Not too large to fit into my encapsulated light fixtures. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Few problems... 1) While they are marked ...
customer_reviews.text: Few problems... 1) While they are marked 2700, the light temperature is much cooler than other 2700K bulbs 2) They are so tall they stick out of the top of the globes in my chandelier. 3) Out of the box, one bulb doesn't work. For the price of LED bulb, that's unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Davis

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used two light bulbs out of this box, both have been in use for several months and are still going strong. Other light bulbs seem to just burn out like crazy. I will definitely be buying these again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Davis

customer_reviews.title: Enclosed fixtures
customer_reviews.text: I've looked at Lowes at some length to find a bulb that can tolerate being in a closed fixture. I found some that were silent on the matter, but have had a burn-out after about a year. These are running now and so far so good for about a month! -- Update after about a year -- Still working great! I don't think I've had a single failure.
customer_reviews.author: Peter G

customer_reviews.title: Great energy saving bulbs without the heat issues of incandescent bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bulbs to replace both my old incandescent bulbs and the florescent bulbs I bought to replace them. These bulbs provide great light, operate at a fraction of the cost of the incandescent and do not have the clean-up issues of the florescent bulbs. I plan to replace all of my current bulbs with the standard screw-in base with these over time and have already bought two packages.
customer_reviews.author: Mike From Mesa

customer_reviews.title: Great price and they work very well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a string of exterior lighting from HFT and the max wattage was 120 for the 12 sockets. These bulbs are only 8 watts for 100 watt eq bulbs. Easy choice for work shop... replace bulbs packaged with the string with these leds! Lots of light!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: they are safe  and save money
customer_reviews.text: i had those twirly u can save money light bulbs. came back from front yard to back house. mm strange smll burning. smoke pouring out of light fixture in kithen hit of switch.. twirly light bulb burning itself to death theu them all out and now whole house is safe and led
customer_reviews.author: richard bain

customer_reviews.title: Love them, perfect color and brightness. Our power bill is lower as well.
customer_reviews.text: We have been replacing all our incandescent lights in our new house over the last few months with these bulbs. The color and brightness are better than the bulbs they replaced. After a few months, our power bill has gone down considerably and I don't need a bunch of spare replacement bulbs. None of the 30 some-odd bulbs have failed. We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sparks54

customer_reviews.title: Not as reliable as I hoped
customer_reviews.text: The first one of these I tried lasted about 30 minutes. It then went dark; no flash or warning, it just quit. The light seems very blue, more than the twisty CFL bulb that was in this lamp, and probably the 'warm' light might be a better choice for average room lighting. The second bulb is still working after about a week of 10-12 hours a day of use. I haven't tried the other 4 yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Stermer

customer_reviews.title: Regular LEDS are not recommended for use in these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these primarily for enclosed cieling fixtures. Regular LEDS are not recommended for use in these. Put them in my halls and the "daylight" is vivid and bright. I don't think you will be disappointed. Only had them in for a week, but no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK JUNK JUNK  How I hate to get ripped off
customer_reviews.text: Bought six and 2 of them failed almost at exactly the same time - approximately 1200 hours. "18 Year Lifespan" - my ***.
customer_reviews.author: Steelbeach

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected, all worked out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected, all worked out of the box. Have changed the whole house, garage and work shop to all LED lighting. Gave all the old bulbs and curly things away. Have some LEDs left "ON" for months. 40 to 60 watt rating and you can handle the bulb with a bare hand and it's maybe warm but never hot! Have not had a failure yet, knock on wood!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So far I have used 2 of these bulbs and ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used 2 of these bulbs and both flicker intermittently if you use them where you notice the flicker it will drive you nuts I moved them to rarely used places
customer_reviews.author: richard braman

customer_reviews.title: I didn't spend a lot, but it gave me a lot
customer_reviews.text: I replaced out whole apartment (16 bulbs) with these and I was more surprised that they are brighter then our old bulbs. I highly recommend these and I would 100% buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Long life
customer_reviews.text: This type of light is soon to be the norm for many households. They operate at 1/5 the usage of similarly watted bulbs and last many years when properly used. The cost is unimportant as we will no longer in this Country be able to purchase either the CFL or standard incandescent bulbs of today's generation.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great bulbs for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These bulbs are fantastic! They are bright and the perfect color white! This is a great deal for these bulbs! I will keep track of the longevity of these bulbs in different fixtures, like a lamp or a ceiling fan. I'll try to update this review again once they go out! So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: NekroDarling

customer_reviews.title: "Let light shine out of darkness"
customer_reviews.text: They all work. The price seemed OK. These are the bluer color- like daylight. I use them in the bathroom & kitchen for more accurate color. The warm white I use in the bedroom & living room. Check back with me in ten years to see if they still work.
customer_reviews.author: swell

customer_reviews.title: Good Light Bulbs - Energy Efficient and Cheap!
customer_reviews.text: These are a good product. These are "daylight" LED bulbs. They produce a nice white light, unlike other types of LED or CFL (compact fluorescent lights) which make a more yellow light. And the LED bulbs use even less energy per lumen than CFL bulbs. I'm definitely not a "tree hugger" but these bulbs use less electricity which means a lower electric bill! And they are usually a good deal cheaper than CFL bulbs. I got them cheaper online than at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: still going
customer_reviews.text: I bought these god knows how long ago. There is still nearly a full box. Only technology is going to replace them, I am starting to get into the smart bulbs with multi-color and remote control.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl S.

customer_reviews.title: WOW !!!  I CAN SEE !!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced many bulbs in my home with this one. In fixtures with multiple bulbs, when I leave the old bulbs in, they look yellow when compared to these. These do a GREAT job and are very bright. WHITE light, not yellow or dim. Very bright and very AWESOME. These are my new go-to lights.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Really bright!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright. Used it in track lighting (3) and everytime i go up my stairs i feel like im outside! Cant believe these are 60w, lumen output i measured was about 875 from 2 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Todd H

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: These light bulbs worked well for me. The easily screwed into the socket and came on when I turned the light switch. Their longevity is unknown at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Get extremely hot
customer_reviews.text: I just put in one of these bulbs, turned on the light for around 1 minute, and then tried to take it out (after turning off the switch). The base of the bulb got burning hot, making it hard to remove, and the heat is still dissipating several minutes later. This seems like it would also impact the energy efficiency.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft White Bulbs
customer_reviews.text: I just used three of these to replace bulbs in a powder room light fixture, and am pleasantly surprised by the natural color of the light. Sometimes LED lights can be blueish - these seem to give off a nice, soft, glow. The kids NEVER turn off the lights in this bathroom. I'm hoping these bulbs last a good long time, and really do save the electricity they claim to.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P.

customer_reviews.title: TOO BRIGHT 😑
customer_reviews.text: 2 arrived broken but not a big deal since amazon has the best customer service and return policy. My problem lies with the fact these bulbs are CRAZY bright (I bought the daylight). Too bright IMO for inside a home. Probably great for an office or garage or outdoors though. I'm going to try the soft white instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Sharlotte Cain

customer_reviews.title: Price is right and they work just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these specifically because they are rated for enclosed fixtures. I wasn’t aware that most inexpensive led bulbs should not be used in enclosed fixtures as the can overheat. Price is right and they work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

product_meta.title: TCP LA927KND6 LED Light Bulbs 60 Watt Equivalent | Energy Efficient (9W) Non-Dimmable A19 Shape E26 medium base, 6 pack, Soft White, 6 Count
product_meta.description:
Color:Soft White| Size:6 Pack

TCP’s A19 LED light bulbs are ideal for use in table and floor lamps, living rooms, kitchens, bedrooms and hallways or ceiling fixtures.


TCP energy efficient LED bulbs are a perfect replacement for standard 60 watt incandescent household bulbs, but they only use 9 watts – an energy savings of up to 85%! 


 The bulbs emit a Soft White color (2700K) which is perfect for indoor lighting as it mimics the glow of standard incandescent bulbs and are suitable for use in indoor or outdoor enclosed fixtures; not dimmable.


TCP has 20+ years of lighting experience and is a leader is LED innovation. We know light. 


COMMON APPLICATIONS: 

• Table and Floor Lamps

• Living Rooms

• Bedrooms

• Dining Rooms

• Hallways

• Ceiling Fixtures


BENEFITS: 

• Replaces your current 60-watt bulb with an energy efficient 9-watt bulb, saving up to 85%!

• Lasts 20,000 hours (18+ years) based on 3 hours per day

• Suitable for indoor/outdoor enclosed fixtures
feature_bullets: SAVE UP TO 85% ON YOUR ENERGY BILL – Buy TCP energy efficient 9 watt LED bulbs to replace your 60 watt bulbs and see the immediate savings!
LONG LASTING 18 YEAR LIFESPAN – Rated at 20, 000 hours based on 3 hours per day. High quality TCP LED light bulbs last longer!

PERFECT BULB VERSATILITY – These Soft White (2700K) LED provide warm and ambient lighting. Ideal for use in table and floor lamps, living rooms, kitchens, bedrooms, bathrooms, and hallways or ceiling fixtures.
800 LUMENS OF IMMEDIATE LIGHT: LEDs provide bright instant light to any room. There is no waiting time to warm up to full brightness.
CONSISTENT COLOR – Keep the soft white light you love with 2700K LED bulbs
QUICK & EASY INSTALL – These are standard A19 shaped bulbs with a medium E26 screw base. Simply install this directly into medium screw base light fixtures.
20+ YEARS OF LIGHTING EXPERIENCE – Manufactured by TCP Lighting, a leader in LED innovation. You can trust us. We know light.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,780 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
